name: Gumi
text: Inã rantsuwa da mãsu yin sahu-sahu (a cikin salla kõ yãƙi).

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan mãsu yin tsãwa dõmin gargaɗi.

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan da mãsu karãtun abin tunãtarwa.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle Abin bautawarku haƙĩƙa ¦aya ne.

name: Gumi
text: Ubangijin sammai da ƙasã da abin da ke tsakãninsu, kuma Ubangijin wurãren fitar rãnã.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle Mũ, Mun ƙãwatãr da sama ta kusa da wata ƙawa, watau taurãri.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma sunã tsari daga dukan Shaiɗan mai tsaurin kai.

name: Gumi
text: Bã zã su iya saurãre zuwa ga jama'a mafi ɗaukaka (Malã'iku) ba, kuma anã jĩfar su daga kõwane gẽfe.

name: Gumi
text: Dõmin tunkuɗẽwa kuma sunã da wata azãba tabbatacciya.

name: Gumi
text: Fãce wanda ya fizgi wata kalma, sai yũla mai haske ta bĩ shi.

name: Gumi
text: Ka tambaye su: "Shin sũ ne mafi wuya ga halittawa, kõ, kuwa waɗanda Muka halitta?" Lalle Mũ, Mun halitta su daga lãkã mai ɗauri.

name: Gumi
text: Ã'a, kã yi mãmãki, alhãli kuwa sunã ta yin izgili.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma idan aka tunãtar da su, bã su tunãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Idan suka ga wata ãyã, sai su dinga yin izgili.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma su ce, "Wannnan bã kõme ba, fãce sihiri, ne bayyananne."

name: Gumi
text: "Shin, idan mun mutu, kuma muka kasance turɓaya da kasũsuwa, ashe, lalle mũ tabbas waɗandaake tãyarwa ne?

name: Gumi
text: "Ashe kõ da ubanninmu na farko?"

name: Gumi
text: Ka ce: "Na'am alhãli kuwa kunã ƙasƙantattu."

name: Gumi
text: Tsãwa guda kawai ce, sai gã su, sunã dũbi.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma su ce: "Yã bonenmu! Wannan ita ce rãnar sakamako."

name: Gumi
text: Wannan ita ce rãnar rarrabẽwa wadda kuka kasance kuna ƙaryatãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Ku tãra waɗanda suka yi zãlunci, da abõkan haɗinsu, da abin da suka kasance sunã bautãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Wanin Allah, sabõda haka ku shiryar da su zuwa ga hanyar Jahĩm.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma ku tsayar da su, lalle su, waɗanda ake yi wa tambaya ne.

name: Gumi
text: Me ya sãme ku, bã ku taimakon jũna?

name: Gumi
text: Ã'a, sũ a yau, mãsu sallamãwa ne.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma sãshensu ya fuskanta ga sãshe, sunã tambayar jũna.

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Lalle kũ, kun kasance kunã jẽ mana daga wajen dãma (inda muka amince)."

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Ã'a, ba ku kasance mũminai ba.

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma wani dalĩli bai kasance ba gare mu a kanku. Ã'a, kun kasance mutãne ne mãsu kẽtare iyãka."

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka maganar Ubangijinmu ta wajaba a kanmu. Lalle mũ, mãsu ɗanɗanãwa ne."

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka muka ɓatar da ku. Lalle mũ, mun kasance ɓatattu."

name: Gumi
text: To lalle sũ a rãnar nan, mãsu tãrayya ne a cikin azãbar.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle Mũ, kamar haka Muke aikatãwa game, da mãsu laifi.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle sũ, sun kasance idan an ce musu: "Bãbu abin bautãwa, fãce Allah," sai su dõra girman kai.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma sunã cẽwa, "Shin, mũ lalle mãsu barin gumãkanmu ne, sabõda maganar wani mawãƙi mahaukaci?

name: Gumi
text: Ã'a, yã zo da gaskiya kuma ya gaskata Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle kũ, haƙĩƙa mãsu ɗanɗana azãba mai raɗaɗi ne.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma bã zã a sãka muku ba fãce da abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Fãce bãyin Allah waɗanda aka tsarkake.

name: Gumi
text: Waɗannan sunã da abinci sananne.

name: Gumi
text: 'Ya'yan itãcen marmari, kuma sunã waɗanda ake girmamãwa.

name: Gumi
text: A cikin gidãjen Aljannar ni'ima.

name: Gumi
text: A kan karagu, sunã mãsu fuskantar jũna.

name: Gumi
text: Anã kẽwayãwa a kansu da hinjãlan giya, ta daga waɗansu marẽmari.

name: Gumi
text: Farã mai dãɗi ga mashãyan.

name: Gumi
text: A cikinta bãbu jirĩ kuma ba su zama mãsu mãye daga gare ta ba,

name: Gumi
text: Kuma a wurinsu, akwai mãtan aure mãsu taƙaita kallonsu, mãsu manyan idãnu.

name: Gumi
text: Kamar dai su ƙwai ne ɓõyayye.

name: Gumi
text: Sai sãshensu ya fuskanta a kan sãshe, sunã tambayar jũna.

name: Gumi
text: Wani mai magana daga cikinsu ya ce: "Lalle ni wani abõki ya kasance a gare ni (a dũniya)."

name: Gumi
text: Yanã cewa, "Shin, kai lalle, kanã daga mãsu gaskatãwa ne?"

name: Gumi
text: "Ashe, idan muka mutu, kuma muka, kasance turɓaya da kasũsuwa, ashe, lalle, mũ tabbas waɗanda ake sãka wa ne?"

name: Gumi
text: (Mai maganar) ya ce: "Shin, kõ ku, mãsu tsinkãya ne (mu gan shi)?"

name: Gumi
text: Sai ya tsinkãya, sai ya gan shi a cikin tsakar Jahim.

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce (masa), "Wallahi, lalle, kã yi kusa, haƙĩƙã, ka halakãni."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma bã dõmin ni'imar Ubangijĩna ba, lalle, dã na kasance daga waɗanda ake halartarwa (tãre da kai a cikin wutã)."

name: Gumi
text: "Shin fa, ba mu zama mãsu mutuwa ba."

name: Gumi
text: "Sai mutuwarmu ta farko, kuma ba mu zama waɗanda ake azabtarwa ba?"

name: Gumi
text: Lalle, wannan shĩ ne babban rabo mai girma.

name: Gumi
text: Sabõda irin wannan, sai mãsu aiki su yi ta aikatãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Shin wancan shĩ ne mafi zama alhẽri ga liyafa kõ itãciyar zaƙƙũm?

name: Gumi
text: Lalle, Mũ, Mun sanya ta fitina ga. azzãlumai.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle ita wata itãciya ce wadda take fita daga asalin Jahĩm.

name: Gumi
text: Gundarta, kamar dai shi kãnun Shaiɗan ne.

name: Gumi
text: To, lalle sũ haƙĩƙa mãsu ci ne daga gare ta. Sa'an nan mãsu cika cikuna ne daga gare ta.

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan lalle sunã da wani garwaye a kanta, daga ruwan zãfi.

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan lalle makomarsu, haƙĩƙa, zuwa ga Jãhĩm take.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle sũ, sun iske ubanninsu batattu.

name: Gumi
text: Sabõda haka sũ, a kan gurãbunsu, suke gaggãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma tabbas haƙĩƙa mafi yawan mutãnen farko sun ɓace a gabãninsu.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma tabbas haƙĩƙa, Mun aika mãsu gargaɗi a cikinsu.

name: Gumi
text: Sai ka dũba yadda ãƙibar waɗanda aka yi wa gargaɗi ta kasance.

name: Gumi
text: Fãce bãyin Allah waɗanda aka tsarkake.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa' Nũhu ya kira Mu. To, madalla da mãsu karɓãwa, Mu.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Mun tsĩrar da shi da mutãnensa daga bakin ciki babba.

name: Gumi
text: Muka sanya zurriyarsa sunã mãsu wanzuwa.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka bar masa (yabo) a cikin jama'ar ƙarshe.

name: Gumi
text: Aminci ya tabbata ga Nũhu, a cikin halittu.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle Mũ kamar haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle shi, yanã daga bãyinMu mũminai.

name: Gumi
text: Sã'an nan Muka nutsar da waɗansunsu.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle daga ƙungiyarsa, haƙĩƙa, Ibrahĩm yake.

name: Gumi
text: A lõkacin da ya je wa dangijinsa da zũciya kuɓutacciya.

name: Gumi
text: A lõkacin da ya ce wa ubansa da mutãnensa, "Mẽne ne kuke bautãwa?"

name: Gumi
text: "Shin, ƙiren ƙarya (wãtau) gumãka, wanin Allah, kuke bautãwa?"

name: Gumi
text: "To, mẽne ne zatonku game da Ubangijin halittu?"

name: Gumi
text: Sai ya yi dũbi, dũba ta sõsai, a cikin taurãri.

name: Gumi
text: Sã'an nan ya ce: "Nĩ mai rashin lãfiya ne."

name: Gumi
text: Sai suka jũya ga barinsa, sunã mãsu jũyãwa da bãya.

name: Gumi
text: Sai ya karkata zuwa ga gumãkansu, sa'an nan ya ce: "Ashe bã zã ku ci ba?

name: Gumi
text: "Me ya sãme ku, bã ku magana?"

name: Gumi
text: Sai ya zuba dũka a kansu da hannun dãma.

name: Gumi
text: Sai suka fuskanto zuwa gare shi, sunã gaggãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce, "Kunã bauta wa abin da kuke sassaƙawa,

name: Gumi
text: "Alhãli, Allah ne Ya halitta ku game da abin da kuke aikatãwa?"

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Ku gina wani gini sabõda shi, sa'an nan ku jẽfa shi a cikin Jahĩm."

name: Gumi
text: Sabõda haka suka yi nufin makĩda game da shi. Sai Muka sanya su, sũ ne mafi ƙasƙanci.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma (Ibrahĩm] ya ce: "Lalle, nĩ mai tafiya ne zuwa ga Ubangijĩna, zai shiryar da ni."

name: Gumi
text: "Ya Ubangijĩna! Ka bã ni (abõkin zama) daga sãlihan mutãne."

name: Gumi
text: Sai Muka yi masa bushãra da wani yãro mai haƙuri.

name: Gumi
text: To, a lõkacin da ya isa aiki tãre da shi, ya ce: "Ya ƙaramin ɗãna! Lalle ne inã gani, a ciki barci, lalle inã yanka ka. To, ka dũba mẽ ka gani?" (Yãron) ya ce: "Ya, Bãbãna! Ka aikata abin da aka umurce ka, zã ka sãme ni, in Allah Ya so, daga mãsu haƙuri."

name: Gumi
text: To, a lõkacin da suka yi sallama, (Ibrahĩm) ya kãyar da shi ga gẽfen gõshinsa.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka kira shi cẽwa "Ya Ibrahĩm!"

name: Gumi
text: "Haƙĩƙa kã gaskata mafarkin." Lalle kamar haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle wannan ita ce jarrabãwa bayyananna.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka yi fansar yãron da wani abin yanka, mai girma.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka bar (yabo) a kansa a cikin mutãnen ƙarshe.

name: Gumi
text: Aminci ya tabbata ga Ibrãhĩm.

name: Gumi
text: Kamar haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle shĩ, yanã daga bãyinMu mũminai.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka yi masa bushãra Da Is'hãƙa ya zama Annabi daga sãlihan mutãne.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka yi albarka a gare shi, kuma ga Is'hãka. Kuma daga cikin zurriyarsu akwai mai kyautatãwa da kuma maizãlunci dõmin kansa, mai bayyanãwa (ga zãluncin).

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle, Mun yi ni'ima ga Mũsã da Hãrũna.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka tsĩrar da su da mutãnensu daga bakin ciki mai girma.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka taimake su, sabõda haka suka kasance mãsu rinjãya.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka ba su Littãfi mai iyãkar bayãni.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka shiryar da su ga hanya mĩƙaƙƙiya.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka bar (yabo) a gare su a cikin mutãnen karshe.

name: Gumi
text: Aminci ya tabbata ga Mũsã da Hãruna.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle kamar haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle, sunã daga bãyinMu mũminai.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle Ilyãs, haƙĩƙa, yanã daga Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: A lõkacin da yake ce wa mutãnensa, "Ashe, bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

name: Gumi
text: "Shin, kunã bauta wa Ba'al ne, kuma kunã barin Mafi kyautatãwar mãsu halitta?"

name: Gumi
text: "Allah Ubangijinku, kuma Ubangijin ubanninku farko?"

name: Gumi
text: Sai suka ƙaryata shi. Sabõda haka sũ lalle waɗanda zã a halartãwa ne (a wutã).

name: Gumi
text: Sai bãyin Allah waɗanda aka tsarkake.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka bar (yabo) a gare shi, a cikin mutãnen ƙarshe.

name: Gumi
text: Aminci ya tabbata ga Ilyãs.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle Mũ kamar haka Muke sãka wa mãsu kyautatãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle shĩ, yanã daga bãyinMu mũminai.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle Lũdu, haƙĩƙa, yanã daga Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: A lõkacin da Muka tsĩrar da shi, da mutãnensa gabã ɗaya.

name: Gumi
text: Sai wata tsõhuwa tanã a cikin mãsu wanzuwa (a cikin azãba).

name: Gumi
text: Sã'an nan Muka darkãke waɗansu mutãnen.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle kũ, haƙĩƙa, kunã shũɗewa a kansu, kunã mãsu asubanci.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma da dare. Shin fa, bã zã ku hankalta ba?

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle Yũnusa, haƙĩƙa, yanã daga Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: A lõkacin da ya gudu zuwa ga jirgin ruwa wanda aka yi wa lõdi.

name: Gumi
text: Sã'an nan ya yi ƙuri'a, sai ya kasance a cikin waɗanda aka rinjaya.

name: Gumi
text: Sai kĩfi ya yi lõma da shi, alhãli kuwa yanã wanda ake zargi.

name: Gumi
text: To, ba dõmin lalle shi ya kasance daga mãsu tasbĩhi ba,

name: Gumi
text: Lalle dã ya zauna a cikin cikinsa har ya zuwa rãnar da zã a tãyar da su.

name: Gumi
text: Sai Muka jẽfa shi ga wani fĩli alhãli kuwa yanã mai raunin rashin lãfiya.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka tsirar da wata itãciya ta kankana a kusa da shi.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka aika shi zuwa ga waɗansu mutãne dubuɗari, kõ sunã ƙaruwa (a kan haka).

name: Gumi
text: Sai suka yi ĩmãni sabõda haka Muka jiyar da su dãdi har wani lõkaci.

name: Gumi
text: Sabõda haka, ka tambaye su, "Shin, Ubangijinka ne da 'ya'ya mãtã, kuma su da ɗiya maza?"

name: Gumi
text: Kõ kuma Mun halitta malã'iku mãtã ne, alhãli kuwa sũ sunãhalarce?

name: Gumi
text: To! Lalle sũ, daga ƙiren ƙaryarsu sunã cẽwa.

name: Gumi
text: "Allah Yã haihu," alhãli kuwa lalle sũ, haƙĩƙa maƙaryata ne.

name: Gumi
text: Shin, Yã zãɓi 'yã'ya mãtã ne a kan ɗiya maza?

name: Gumi
text: Mẽ ya same ku? Yãya kuke hukuntãwa (wannanhukunci)?

name: Gumi
text: Shin, bã ku tunãni?

name: Gumi
text: Ko kuma kunã da wani dalĩli bayyananne ne?

name: Gumi
text: To, ku zo da littãfinku idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma suka sanya nasaba a tsakãninSa da tsakãnin aljannu. Alhãli kuwa Lalle aljannu sun sani, "Lalle sũ, haƙĩƙa waɗanda ake halartarwa ne (a cikin wutã.)"

name: Gumi
text: Tsarki ya tabbata ga Allah daga abin da suke siffantãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Sai bãyin Allah waɗanda aka tsarkake.

name: Gumi
text: To, lalle, ku da abin da kuke bautãwa,

name: Gumi
text: Ba ku zama mãsu buwãya ba a gare Shi.

name: Gumi
text: Sai wanda yake mai shiga babbar wutã Jahĩm.

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma bãbu kõwa daga cikinmu, fãce yanã da matsayi sananne."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma lalle mu, haƙĩƙa, mũ ne mãsu yin sahu-sahu (dõmin ibãda)."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma lalle mũ haƙĩƙa, mũ ne mãsu yin tasbĩhi."

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle sũ, sun kasance sunã cẽwa,

name: Gumi
text: "Dã lalle munã da wani littãfi irin na mutãnen farko."

name: Gumi
text: "Lalle dã mun kasance bãyin Allah waɗanda aka tsarkake."

name: Gumi
text: Sai suka kãfirta da shi. Sabõda haka zã su sani.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa kalmarMu ta gabãta ga bãyinMu, Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle sũ, haƙĩƙa, sũ ne waɗanda ake taimako.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle rundunarMu, haƙĩƙa, sũ ne marinjaya.

name: Gumi
text: Sabõda haka juya daga barinsu, har a wani lõkaci.

name: Gumi
text: Ka nũna musu (gaskiya), da haka zã su dinga gani.

name: Gumi
text: Shin fa, da azabarMu suke nẽman gaggãwa?

name: Gumi
text: To, idan ta sauka ga farfãjiyarsu, to, sãfiyar wadanda ake yi wa gargaɗi ta mũnana.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma ka jũya daga barinsu har a wani lõkaci.

name: Gumi
text: Ka nũna (musu gaskiya), da haka zã su dinga nũnãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Tsarki ya tabbata ga Ubangijinka, Ubangijin rinjãye, daga barin abin da suke siffantãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma aminci ya tabbata ga Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin halittu.
